meanings.definition: Represented as a series of bits
meanings.sent1: The computer displayed a bitmapped image on the screen.
meanings.sent2: The bitmapped graphic looked pixelated when enlarged.
meanings.sent3: I tried to draw a bitmapped picture, but it ended up looking like a bunch of squares.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a bitmapped memory, storing information in binary form.
meanings.sent5: The bitmapped representation of the data made it easy to understand.

meanings.definition: A digital image or font that is composed of a grid of pixels
meanings.sent1: The website used bitmapped images for its logos.
meanings.sent2: The bitmapped font was clear and easy to read on the screen.
meanings.sent3: I printed out the bitmapped picture and it came out pixelated.
meanings.sent4: The bitmapped image reminded me of old video game graphics.
meanings.sent5: The bitmapped photo captured every detail of the scene.

meanings.definition: To convert an image or font into a series of bits
meanings.sent1: She bitmapped the logo to make it compatible with the software.
meanings.sent2: The program can easily bitmapped any image you upload.
meanings.sent3: I decided to bitmapped the text to save storage space.
meanings.sent4: He bitmapped the photograph, turning it into a digital file.
meanings.sent5: The artist will bitmapped the design before printing it.
